correct_order: There is one 11-year old boy who had been adopted by five families.
Moreover, he had been studying in four different schools.
The consequence is that he has problem fitting in the society.
Moreover his academic performance was not good.
He was sent to his relatives’ family in order for him to be well taken care of.

sources: The consequence is that he has problem fitting in the society.
